Name: Golden Nail
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Southern/Louisiana-style whisky liqueur (e.g. Southern Comfort)
2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A warming taste of southern hospitality.
Nutrition: One serving of Golden Nail contains 168 calories
